long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With Ergo Chat, you can chat with dozens of documents and websites simultaneously to get insights and answers that you trust. While other AI chat platforms chat with the whole internet or one website, Ergo Chat allows you to create a unique library. It’s a great solution for both businesses and individuals.

What makes Ergo Chat different from other AI chat services? 
    ●   Unlimited uploads: Chat with as many websites or PDFs as needed simultaneously. 
    ●   Analyze more content: Ergo Chat can read chat threads like those on Reddit or customer reviews as well as websites that you have a subscription to.
    ●   More precise answers: Ergo Chat will say when it doesn't have enough information to answer. It won't draw information from anywhere other than the sources you provide, minimizing the risk of hallucinations.
    ●   Convenient interface: Chat with a Chrome extension pop up so it’s not in the way or move it to your sidebar to chat at any time.

Here are just a few ways people are using Ergo Chat:
Businesses:
    ●   Repurpose specialized content: Create a chatbot based on your unique database and customer profiles.
    ●   Expedited contract analysis: Read through large SOWs or contracts to find the most relevant information quickly.
    ●   Customer research: Analyze competitive websites, large survey, or focus group transcripts for market research.

Individuals + Freelancers:
 ●   Product research: Summarize product reviews or online chat rooms for quick summaries.
 ●   Academic writing: Scan dozens of academic papers to find specific information, fact check, or catch inconsistencies while writing academic research. Quickly create citations.
 ●   Dungeons and Dragons story development: build a library filled with character-specific information and filter information for characters or build specific information on the fly.
 ●   Reddit research: add dozens of Reddit pages or chat logs and quickly synthesize the most important takeaways without spending hours reading through threads.

Ergo Chat saves you time while giving you insights you can trust because you control the dataset.control the dataset.
